title: Espresso Italiano
description: A classic Italian espresso with a rich aroma and bold flavor, perfect for a quick energy boost.

title: Cappuccino
description: A smooth blend of espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam, delivering a perfect balance of flavor and texture.

title: Latte Macchiato
description: A layered espresso-based drink with silky steamed milk and light foam, ideal for a creamy coffee experience.

title: Mocha
description: A delightful fusion of espresso, chocolate, and milk, topped with whipped cream for a sweet indulgence.

title: Cold Brew
description: Brewed slowly in cold water for 12 hours, this refreshing drink offers smooth, low-acid coffee with a natural sweetness.
